page.title: 12LOCAL ARTIST,LYDART
page.content: My name is Sarah Allpress;I spent my childhood on a farm in Cornwall but went to study fine art in Bristol for four years and gained a 1st class honours degree in l975. I sell my work through exhibitions such as the Royal Academy summer show, galleries and privately. My paintings are done in oil on canvas measuring 5'x 6' which take about two months to complete. I paint from life and from composite drawings in the studio. My images are trees,grass,ferns,walls, pathways - and details of these. Within my landscapes I use figures and 1985 images - cars,pylons,and road signs. The subject matter is often a small family event in a large land- scape,such as a walk in a park. I am at present learning anatomy for my work is shifting towards figures.
